CmdLine: yum install -y wget socat docker 		&& wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/eclipse/orion.client/master/bundles/org.eclipse.orion.client.core/web-ide.conf 		&& mv web-ide.conf /usr/share/eclipse/orion.conf 		&& echo "-Dorion.core.configFile=/usr/share/eclipse/orion.conf" >> /usr/share/eclipse/orion.ini 		&& sed -i 's/serverworkspace/\/workspace/' /usr/share/eclipse/orion.ini 		&& sed -i 's/#orion.auth.admin.default.password={password}/orion.auth.admin.default.password=passw0rd/' /usr/share/eclipse/orion.conf 		&& sed -i 's/#orion.auth.log.service=admin/orion.auth.log.service=admin/' /usr/share/eclipse/orion.conf 		&& sed -i 's/#orion.file.defaultSCM=git/orion.file.defaultSCM=git/'  /usr/share/eclipse/orion.conf 		&& sed -i 's/#orion.file.diskUsageEnabled=true/orion.file.diskUsageEnabled=true/' /usr/share/eclipse/orion.conf 		&& chmod +x /usr/share/eclipse/entrypoint.sh 		&& chmod +x /usr/share/eclipse/stack.sh 		&& ln -s /usr/share/eclipse/stack.sh /usr/local/bin/stack
